name: OR_CASE_ALT_TREAT_EFF
description: This table stores the effectiveness of alternate treatment as compared to operative treatment.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ALT_TREATMENT_EFFECT_C_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the effectiveness of alternate treatments compared to operative treatments.
